mapper.select: SELECT ts.trip_seq, ts.trip_stamps_seq, a.created_at, tp.latitude, tp.longitude FROM articles a LEFT JOIN trip_stamps ts on a.trips_seq = ts.trip_seq LEFT JOIN trip_places tp on ts.trip_places_seq = tp.trip_places_seq WHERE a.open_yn='y' AND str_to_date(a.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') AND str_to_date(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(a.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AND a.trips_seq IN (SELECT t.trips_seq FROM trips t WHERE users_seq=#{userSeq})

SELECT ts.trip_seq, ts.trip_stamps_seq, a.created_at, tp.latitude, tp.longitude FROM articles a LEFT JOIN trip_stamps ts on a.trips_seq = ts.trip_seq LEFT JOIN trip_places tp on ts.trip_places_seq = tp.trip_places_seq WHERE str_to_date(a.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') AND str_to_date(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(a.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AND a.trips_seq IN (SELECT t.trips_seq FROM trips t WHERE users_seq=#{userSeq})

SELECT album.title, album.trips_seq, album.thumbnail_url, album.open_yn, album.like_yn FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY a.created_at DESC) AS row, a.title, a.trips_seq, a.thumbnail_url, a.open_yn, exists(select * from likes l where l.users_seq=#{userSeq} and l.articles_seq=a.articles_seq) AS like_yn FROM articles a WHERE a.open_yn='y' AND a.trips_seq IN (SELECT t.trips_seq FROM trips t WHERE users_seq=#{userSeq})) AS album WHERE (#{page}-1)*10 < album.row AND album.row < 1+(#{page}*10)
